name: Berlin
fun_fact: Fun fact: The Currywurst was invented in Berlin in 1949 by Herta Heuwer, who mixed ketchup with curry powder she got from British soldiers - now 800 MILLION currywursts are eaten in Germany annually, and Berlin even has a Currywurst Museum!

hero_dishes.name: Currywurst
hero_dishes.description: Sliced pork sausage covered in curry ketchup sauce, served with fries or bread roll
hero_dishes.origin_story: Invented 1949 by Herta Heuwer in Charlottenburg. She kept the sauce recipe secret until her death. A bronze plaque marks her original stand
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Curry 36, Konnopke's Imbiss (since 1930), Witty's, street stands citywide
